channel.title: Making a database in delphi
channel.description:
Yes, I want to make an database in delhi. Why?, i have a contest with my friend on school who can make the best database in a program as: Visual Basic Or delhi. He choosed Visual so I dephi unfortuniatly, I have no experiments with delphi :o The question is: How can i make a database, with delhi that if the user fills in the form. The information will send it to the ( SQL ? MS ? Database)...
Thank you ,
[b]Eduard[/b]

Build Database Applications with Delphi

Find tutorials, tips, and techniques to help you build databases using the Delphi programming language. These resources cover SQL Server, Access, Firebird, and more.
